doc.previous: Cycles can be synchronized with periodic phenomena  Calendars with two levels of cycles
doc.after: Very commonly a calendar includes more than one type of cycle or has both cyclic and acyclic elements  Most calendars incorporate more complex cycles For example the vast majority of them track years months weeks and days The seven day week is practically universal though its use varies It has run uninterrupted for millennia 2
